message_1: A substitution cipher has been used to encrypt the message "MTGSS" by replacing each letter with its corresponding letter three places to the right in the alphabet. What is the original message before it was encrypted?
message_2:
To decrypt the message, we need to replace each letter with its corresponding letter three places to the left in the alphabet.

M -> (M-3) -> J
T -> (T-3) -> Q
G -> (G-3) -> D
S -> (S-3) -> P
S -> (S-3) -> P

The original message before it was encrypted is "JQDPP".
